title: Prioritising a Personal Deep-Work Session
vignette: Someone is immersed in a high-stakes flow task when a top-ranking authority figure (CEO, governor, general) walks in unexpectedly. Ignoring the visitor could bring serious professional fallout.

options.text: Continue the task; do not interrupt important personal work.
Interrupt and acknowledge to avoid negative consequences.

title: Greeting a Respected Mentor Mid-Focus
vignette: During intense practice, a person's long-time mentor enters the room. The mentor's support was pivotal to their growth; continuing to work risks appearing rude.

options.text: Do not interrupt; the personal activity takes precedence.

title: Personal Tasks on Company Time
vignette: Employees are using a sizeable chunk of paid hours on private matters—stock trading, long personal calls, a side gig—within view of management.

options.text: Focus on work tasks to not misuse company time.

title: Routine vs Risk on a Journey
vignette: A solo traveller must perform a daily medical routine ideally done at rest, but stopping on an isolated road could invite danger or big delays.

options.text: Stop to perform the routine despite the risk.
Continue and perform the routine as best as possible in the compromised situation.

title: Optimal Individual Timing vs. Group Participation
vignette: Someone has the opportunity to perform a valued personal activity at what they consider the perfect time for maximum personal benefit or efficiency. Alternatively, they could delay it to do it as part of a group activity, which has its own social or collaborative benefits but might be less ideal for them personally.

options.text: Wait and perform the activity with the group.
Perform the activity immediately by oneself.

title: Staying for a Post-Event Ritual
vignette: After a team lunch the group wants a quick wrap-up chat / photo. One member has an urgent commitment elsewhere.

options.text: Stay and join the group ritual.
Leave early to attend to urgent matters.

title: Valuables and a Public Restroom
vignette: A person must use a busy public restroom while carrying a high-value, sensitive item (passport, prototype, expensive electronics). Outside: risk of theft. Inside: unclean environment.

options.text: Bring the item inside for safekeeping.
Leave the item outside to avoid unhygienic conditions.
